viewData.name: Samsung RU8000 49" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung RU8000 49" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart LED TV featuring 4K UHD 3840 x 2160 LED Panel, HDR10, HDR10+, HLG Support Motion Rate 120 Technology. Review Samsung RU8000
viewData.long_description: View content at four times the resolution of 1080p with the Samsung RU8000 49" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart LED TV. This TV has a 48.5" LED-backlit LCD panel, and incorporates Motion Rate 120 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. It is compatible with the HDR10, HDR10+, and HLG HDR formats to provide a wider color gamut with compatible content and other equipment for more vivid images. The RU8000 has built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity to provide access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. With four HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. Two USB ports are also onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like flash drives. Bixby, Google Assistant, and Amazon Alexa functionality is also supported.
